name: Nautilus (itch) (SolarPink)
description:
Nautilus is a short text based horror game about descending deep into the ocean.

Please be warned that this game contains:

  • Sound based jump scares
  • Unsettling themes
  • Deep sea scary vibes

It is my first official Twine game, and I created it over the span of two days.

Personally, I am terrified of the ocean. Please enjoy me trying to convert my fear into a game.
